text: Salt the lemons generously.  Put them in a bowl. Put to one side to infuse for a week to 10 days. Cover with a clean tea towel to stop particles falling in. Baste the lemons daily, using a pastry brush and collecting the brine that forms over the lemon and redistributing it.  Stick the cloves into the pickling onions. As many as wished but there is no need to overdo it. Put the lemons into a stone crock or a large glass jar with the garlic cloves and clove stuck onions.  Heat the vinegar, cut ginger and remaining spices. Bring to the boil for a few minutes. Strain the mixture. Pour it over the lemons and mix together. Cover or put the lid on. If wished, add chillies the day after making. Store in a dry place.  Finished.
